title: Failing tests with sensor noise since pull request #923

content.raw:
There's some [Jenkins tests failing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/482/testReport/) due to an assertion:
~~~
105: [ RUN      ] NoiseTest.ApplyGaussian
105: ***** Internal Program Error - assertion (noise->GetNoiseType() == Noise::GAUSSIAN || noise->GetNoiseType() == Noise::GAUSSIAN_QUANTIZED) failed in static gazebo::sensors::NoisePtr gazebo::sensors::NoiseFactory::NewNoiseModel(sdf::ElementPtr, const string&):
105: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/Noise.cc(50): Noise type should be 'gaussian' or 'gaussian_quantized'
105/128 Test #105: UNIT_Noise_TEST ........................***Exception: Other  2.55 sec
~~~

I followed a backtrace to instances of the GaussianNoiseModel class, which isn't setting its `Noise::type` value.

I proposed a fix in pull request #923, but major refactoring of the Sensor::Noise class was requested, so I declined that pull request and stopped working on it.
content.html:
There's some Jenkins tests failing due to an assertion:

105: [ RUN      ] NoiseTest.ApplyGaussian
105: ***** Internal Program Error - assertion (noise->GetNoiseType() == Noise::GAUSSIAN || noise->GetNoiseType() == Noise::GAUSSIAN_QUANTIZED) failed in static gazebo::sensors::NoisePtr gazebo::sensors::NoiseFactory::NewNoiseModel(sdf::ElementPtr, const string&):
105: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/Noise.cc(50): Noise type should be 'gaussian' or 'gaussian_quantized'
105/128 Test #105: UNIT_Noise_TEST ........................***Exception: Other  2.55 sec

I followed a backtrace to instances of the GaussianNoiseModel class, which isn't setting its Noise::type value.

I proposed a fix in pull request #923, but major refactoring of the Sensor::Noise class was requested, so I declined that pull request and stopped working on it.
